com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Gameobjects

Class CoreData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Gameobjects.CoreData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasID, java.io.Serializable

    public class CoreData
extends java.lang.Object
implements HasID, java.io.Serializable
    A small block object hich stores only id and value and is only used for storing in memory. Stores only 8 byte.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getLightlevel

        public float getLightlevel()
        Description copied from interface: HasID
        How bright is the object? The lightlevel is a scale applied to the color. 1 is default value.
        Specified by:
        getLightlevel in interface HasID
        Returns:
        1 is default bright. 0 is black.
